field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #MESSAGE_ID# - Message ID #USER_ID# - User ID #USER_NAME# - User first name #USER_LAST_NAME# - User last name #SENDER_ID# - Message sender ID #SENDER_NAME# - Message sender first name #SENDER_LAST_NAME# - Message sender last name #TITLE# - Message title #MESSAGE# - Message body #EMAIL_TO# - Recipient e-mail address
